titles: The milkmaids resolution. Let young men prate of what they please cause young men have been kind, theyl find no more such foolls as these to please each apish mind. Tune, Cupids Trappan.
publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby at the Golden Ball in West-Smithfield.,
notes: Date and place of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "Of late I did hear a young man domineer ..."
